website_summaries.verdict: A reasonably priced set of espresso cups that come with saucers and a chrome stand to hold them.
pros: These porcelain 4-ounce cups are perfect for the regular espresso drinker
The portable stand makes them easy for entertaining and accessibility
The set is also dishwasher, freezer, and microwave safe
cons: Some mugs arrived cracked and with other packing issues

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price, cheap build quality
customer_reviews.text: These are nice for the price, but the set i've received has pretty bad build quality. One (messy) weld arrived completely detached, with the rod next to it not even being the same length. The base rods are not straight or symmetrical, they do not line up with each other. They also arrived poorly packaged. This was in the retail box, not the Amazon box, so it's not an amazon package issue. The cups weren't guarded against the metal, so there are many black marks on them. The box was also pretty smashed up. I'd skip these and buy a different set, even if it's a bit more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Hickerson

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate description
customer_reviews.text: Who knows, maybe I got a defective set, but the item description states that these cups will hold 4oz of liquid which was perfect for use with my Nespresso Inissia which gives a 3.75oz lungo pour. Ran the Nespresso machine and coffee started overflowing out of this espresso cup. I used a measuring cup to see how much liquid these cups actually hold and it's just a tad over 3oz. Overall, good for what they are considering the price, but this first world problem of mine with these cups is actually pretty annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Bry

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality, Space Saving
customer_reviews.text: These look great on my counter next to my Inissia machine. Holds the largest cup of espresso my machine makes plus hot milk and froth to make a perfect cup of cappuccino. Very satisfied and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Angela R. Neil

customer_reviews.title: Great service but....
customer_reviews.text: Service was great [the seller]; the product, not so much. The first set arrived with a shattered saucer. The seller immediately sent a replacement, no charge. The second set is intact. I did notice (as I saw others wrote) that many of the pieces have black marks that will not wash off. I have one decent set with all the pieces so I am keeping the set. The cappuccino cups will hold a Luongo brew from my nespresso machine (original line) which is somewhere just shy of 4 oz. That leaves a tiny bit of room for some frothed milk if you so desire. I prefer my cappuccinos in my 6 oz cups. (withmore milk).
customer_reviews.author: dadshop2000

customer_reviews.title: Unremovable Black Marks
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews in which some people complained about unremovable black marks on the cups but I had bought this same set from this seller several years ago and was happy with my purchase. When I dropped and broke a couple of those cups recently, I decided to reorder despite some of the recent reviews. I just received the package today and every single cup has multiple black marks that cannot be cleaned or removed. The quality has deteriorated significantly.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cup for double espresso
customer_reviews.text: For those of you who want a double shot of espresso in one cup from your Nespresso look no further. These cups are perfect for a doppio. Also, unlike my previous cups, these have a nice wide base so they are difficult to tip over. True you can't get your finger through the handle but who cares. Pinky up and sip up!
customer_reviews.author: Ward K

customer_reviews.title: Great little buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for the office... they are perfect for a small counter top, I wish they could hold 7 ounces comfortably but 6 oz is about the max for ease of serving... Also, they do not retain heat as well as I though they would. However they have met a need and wouldn't Not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Barry Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Cute espresso cups!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend for his birthday as he's getting more into espresso and making special/ fancy coffee at home, and they're adorable! He likes them just fine and can't wait to use them. They take up very little space since they're stacking, and none of the cups or saucers were broken upon delivery (they were very well packaged). They're also just fun since they're fairly small (to me anyway).
customer_reviews.author: J.A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Both sets we've ordered, the metal rack is too small for the cups :(
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, the metal rack is too small for the cups, scraping the side of them as you pull them out or try to shove them back in. We've now returned a set and ordered another. In both sets the cups are too large in diameter for the metal rack. Really disappointing considering everything else about this set we love! They're a good size for lattes, it's nice to have out on the counter, looks-wise, and the height is perfect to fit under our espresso machine.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my costume shop to sit next to the cappuccino machine. Everyone loves them, and so many comments from my guests about how nice it is to have a proper cup and saucer. The stand is quality and I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette H.

customer_reviews.title: the saucer makes it handy to move around without slopping on floor and looks like i am having a big treat
customer_reviews.text: a recently purchased express maker did not come with any cups and so i ordered these. my maker is a tiny bit irregular in dispersing water, and occasionally spills over, or is to the brim of the cup. the saucer makes it handy to move around without slopping on floor and looks like i am having a big treat. if you are not going to wash immediately, i recommend you rinse well as espresso has a tendency to stain. i have had a lot of success using a small amount of bleach and cold water for a soak, and back to sparkling white again.
customer_reviews.author: helen0225

customer_reviews.title: Great expresso set
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an expresso cup set to go with my new Nespresso machine. I searched on Amazon through tons of options, with great confusion about what size cup was appropriate. In the end, I am glad that I found these. A single expresso fills to half, and a double fills to the top. The set is extremely convenient and takes up very little counter space. I hand wash the cups, because my dishwasher does not hold small items well. But it is not an inconvenience as they take seconds to wash clean. Very good value. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MulsanneN138

customer_reviews.title: Nice cups with tiny handles
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of cubs and saucers. It is as advertised. The downside is that the handles are so small that it is difficult to pick up a cub of hot coffee. The hole in the handle is so small that none of us can get our finger into it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: The cups and holder are fine, but they are just slightly too small for my Nespresso machine. The machine fills the cups all the way up to the brim and you can't take the cup away without spilling.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny VDSCO

customer_reviews.title: Good set but handles a little hard to grip
customer_reviews.text: The fit and finish of all the components are great. This fits under my cabinets and looks great next to our espresso maker. The only minor gripe is that the handles are too small to really get a good grip with my larger hands. I would expect them to be larger for a 4oz cup but it may affect the asthetics of the set.
customer_reviews.author: Cody G.

customer_reviews.title: Fine quality, very good design, handle too small
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good-looking set. The cups are of high quality. Good form factor for espresso. So much better than coffee mugs if you're drinking espresso. I didn't think the rack was going to be very useful, but I was wrong. I now consider the rack indispensable for convenience and an organization. The handle is a bit too small. I have rather thin fingers, and still feel like the index finger isn't finding the hole roomy. It's very possible that someone of large fingers may not be able to put his/her index finger into this thing. Perhaps they made these for ladies only?
customer_reviews.author: zemes

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be of good quality and are the perfect size for a cappuccino. The rack is convenient for storage as well. The packaging was nice and padded.
customer_reviews.author: AZC

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work out.
customer_reviews.text: Would have enjoyed the set, which was very attractive. However, the cups and saucers are shipped in the metal rack as shown, and the bottom saucer was broken in many places. I called and asked for one saucer replacement, and was told I would have to return the whole set and order an entire replacement set. Nothing guarantees the next set won't have a broken piece also, so I just returned it for a refund, since repackaging for return was a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy R

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and sexy
customer_reviews.text: Truly a "see-it-buy-it" item. Does exactly what is shown. If you are a space-safer or have compulsive OCD about keeping your apartment neat and tidy, this is that neat look that you want. The quality of porcelain was grade A as well. All that is needed is to accompany it with some good coffee. I strongly recommend Haitian Bleu; tip from a coffee fanatic.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan D

customer_reviews.title: We love these and that we can keep them on our ...
customer_reviews.text: We love these and that we can keep them on our counter. We drink cocoa in them every day. They are petit and we like that it takes 2 or 3 fills to equal a regular mug. Each round is hot and we like the ritual of the pouring ;)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... are way way way small but I kind of like them when your holding them you cant stop but ...
customer_reviews.text: They are way way way small but I kind of like them when your holding them you cant stop but think how refine you look just like the rich folk in the western movies and old school french cafe every time I drink my coffee I travel to a place of leisure and high class only to realize that i drank the coffee in one gulp and find myself as a poor college student but what a morning.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great set of Cappuccino cups!
customer_reviews.text: These stackable cups are great. We were looking for something we could put right beside the espresso machine, something that would take up a minimal amount of counter space. The size is perfect for a cappuccino, and the matching saucer makes it easy to carry and deliver cups. This set sits on our counter beside the matching 2 oz. set that we use for espresso. Can't beat the amazon price.
customer_reviews.author: J. pulfer

customer_reviews.title: It is a good item and fits in my cabinet so I don't ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a good item and fits in my cabinet so I don't have to leave on the counter if I don't want to. I did have a problem with the Space saving stand. It was a bit defective so the cups wouldn't slide up and out easily. I had to use my husbands metal file tool so I could file down a piece of the metal that was inside the stand preventing the cups from coming out. Didn't want to take the time to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: SM from NJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Really nice cups and plates. The fact that their stackable is great for a small kitchen, it keeps everything nice and organized without taking up much space. Only drawback is that you need to be careful when sliding the cups into the holder because it can scratch the sides of the cup if you insert them at a bad angle.
customer_reviews.author: C.B.M.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and simple espresso cups and saucers
customer_reviews.text: Cute little espresso cups, sits nice and compact on the counter. The cup handles are dainty, but seem sturdy otherwise. Would make a great gift for coffee lovers.
customer_reviews.author: adam cosby

customer_reviews.title: The base wiggles to much
customer_reviews.text: I’m not to crazy about it the base is not stable enough too wiggle and it’s very hard to take the mugs out ,also the plates underneath Kinda bummed out no worth the 40 bucks
customer_reviews.author: Dina jael Torres

customer_reviews.title: These are quite small. They're labled 4 oz, ...
customer_reviews.text: These are quite small. They're labled 4 oz, and thats a bit generous. When I measured I had just under 4 oz. I bought these for cappuccino -- wrong purchase. I returned them and got the ones that are meant for cappuccino. If youre looking for an espresso mug, these will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: guywhobuysalotfromamazon

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for espresso lungo
customer_reviews.text: These are a great, compact little set of cups. I use them at least once a day as cups for espresso lungo. The tower stacking is nice as well, saving a good bit of space. They hold up in the dishwasher and they've been workhorses, being used at least once a day for a year or two. If I needed more, I'd reorder in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Ioannes M.

customer_reviews.title: NOT 4 OZ.
customer_reviews.text: It's fine as a 2oz shot cup, but not for a double. I don't understand why it's advertised so inaccurately.
customer_reviews.author: Customer 92

customer_reviews.title: it's more like a dollar store white
customer_reviews.text: meh. it's not a bright white. it's more like a dollar store white. i struggled to pull the cups out the first time. im hoping it just has to loosen up after use. i literally had to pull the metal open more to get them out.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: It is what i need
customer_reviews.text: It goes with the other items we brought for the conference room. This is the second set I brougth.
customer_reviews.author: scherryl Fairchild

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: The cups and saucers are just perfect for our new cuban coffee adventure. We recently learned how to make this wonderful brew from our trip to the FL keys and the cup makes the experience all the better. Only 4 stars as I wish this sytle had come in different metals for the holder like black or bronze to better match our kitchen so I can leave it out on the counter. But It's so tiny I can just slip it in the cupboard.
customer_reviews.author: MelK

customer_reviews.title: It's nice if you have big biceps to pull on the ...
customer_reviews.text: The vertical metal holder is not wide enough. I broke a cup trying to shove it in. It's nice if you have big biceps to pull on the metal holder. The whole idea was to save space on the counter. Now I have 3 cups and 4 plates. I wish they tested their products. Too bad. It would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: suskie

customer_reviews.title: We brought these to the cafe down the street and asked them to stop serving us in paper cups and use these instead
customer_reviews.text: We brought these to the cafe down the street and asked them to stop serving us in paper cups and use these instead. Now we feel like normal people when we go for coffee. These are durable and well made; but should probably come with spoons. Humans should not drink coffee from paper cups any more than they should use plastic forks to cut steak.
customer_reviews.author: Helen L

customer_reviews.title: Mine survived the shipping trip
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing for the price. The box was pulverized when it arrived but somehow there was no damage to the dishes -- I think I got lucky. I couldn't be happier with these.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for some cappuccino cups and saucers and these fit the bill. I use them everyday. Only complaint: The shipper should have taped the top of the inner box that the cups, saucers and holder were packed in. It came open and some of the items slipped. Fortunately the outer wrapping around that box kept them from breaking, but I think I was just lucky. So improve the packing and it is all perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Halesr

customer_reviews.title: Good looking set.
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect. The porcelain appears to be good quality. All of the cups and saucers are smooth and evenly formed. I like the fact they stack.The chrome stand and white porcelain look good together. With minor reorganizing of one cupboard, I placed this in the front corner. Now it is convenient to grab a cup and saucer.
customer_reviews.author: WY Kinfolk

customer_reviews.title: teeny tiny
customer_reviews.text: I ordered not realizing how incredibly small they are! Should have done a little more research on the size of the cup. Still think they look good, but I returned because they wouldn't get any use.
customer_reviews.author: krystleivy

customer_reviews.title: The price is pretty good for what you get
customer_reviews.text: The price is pretty good for what you get. Although the wire rack was a little tight. So tight that it scratched a couple of my cups before I wised up to it. I had to kinda wrench it loose to make the gap slightly larger. After that, it doesn't scrape the cups anymore.
customer_reviews.author: R. Z. B.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute set for my espresso machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this set and use it every day. My only complaint is that it's hard to remove the cups because it's a tight fit pulling it through the top. It almost takes two hands to pull the mug out. Is it supposed to be like that? Also, my cats have claimed two of these as their new water bowls so I might need to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: SamSquanch

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, nice design
customer_reviews.text: Nicely put together. A quality set overall, it looks nice on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Fits nicely on the counter without taking up much space
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Fits nicely on the counter without taking up much space. Quality of cups and saucers is great for this price point. The metal holder is perfect and hold everything steady. Also like that the cup handles are big enough to fit a finger through.
customer_reviews.author: I.B. Tellin-truth

customer_reviews.title: Nice cups
customer_reviews.text: These are nice cups - VERY small! With our Nespresso machine, you have to use the tiny cup setting and even then there's barely any room for sugar/cream. Good look and good quality though.
customer_reviews.author: Britten W. Hale

customer_reviews.title: Hail to Me.
customer_reviews.text: I am now coffee king of the office. All coworkers bow before my french press. The peasants line up to be one of the lucky 3 that gets to drink the remaining nectar of the God's after I've had my lion's share of the prize.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Great stackable set of cups and saucers..
customer_reviews.text: Great stackable esspresso cups that take up a minimal amount of space. Bought these without looking at the size, thought they'd be cappuccino size, but they are only fro esspresso. Bought the bigger set for capuccino, now we are all set... Very nice product at a very low price...
customer_reviews.author: J. pulfer

customer_reviews.title: Just Perfect for the Counter
customer_reviews.text: The stackable design for the cups and saucers is pleasing to the eye as it sits on my counter. The cups are the perfect size to fit my espresso machine and although a smidge less than four oz the minor off on its liquid size makes little difference in making lattes for the family.
customer_reviews.author: Beester

customer_reviews.title: On Second Order, Got Slightly Different Set.
customer_reviews.text: I really want to give this 5 starts, because it's a great set. The only issue is that I bought a second set (after one of the saucers arrived broken, and eventually a colleague broke one of the cups) and when it came, the cups were slightly different in size and didn't fit in the new or old rack as cleanly as the first set. Yes the new set fits fine, if a bit tightly, and works, but it make me wonder how many different sets there are, and how these pieces are being sourced. All I want is a little consistency! Thus the 4 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Addition to Cappuccino Maker
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect addition to our DeLonghi EC680 coffee maker. The cups fit well under the cappuccino maker. The size of 7 ounces is exactly what we need. The cups look the same as the cups in a five-start Fairmont Hotel. We enjoy the set every day.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph K

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thought the cups would be bigger. I ended up giving them away
customer_reviews.author: Bob Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Cute set
customer_reviews.text: Adorable, got for my coffe station in pantry. One came broke but Amazon replaced the whole set thankfully
customer_reviews.author: Cyline Breton

customer_reviews.title: Stylish set highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I only gave 5 stars because there were no more. Glazed Porcelain, sturdy and the rack is a quality made piece. I was concerned it would be flimsy. I bought this at the same time as theand now have 2 great quality sets to fill my coffee needs.
customer_reviews.author: WizardsOfAmazon (FB)

customer_reviews.title: too shallow for a full shot
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping a full long shot of espresso would fit in the cup but it doesn't. Order the large size.
customer_reviews.author: Fit Hot MEss

customer_reviews.title: Good cups
customer_reviews.text: Good looking cups to hold your espresso. The stackable bin makes storing easy and takes up less room which is great when you have limited counter space.
customer_reviews.author: Michael West

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and seem to be a good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the few things I allow to stay on my kitchen counter, right next to our little espresso maker. Looks nice and seem to be a good quality, and no discoloration after a few months of use (and occasionally has coffee left sitting in it them day)
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Cute Set of Cups
customer_reviews.text: These are simple and take up very little space, being stackable, with the holder that is the most important part.
customer_reviews.author: Objective Reader of DescriptionsTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: came in perfect condition!
customer_reviews.text: So cute, came in perfect condition!! Looks great in my kitchen and makes my mornings even better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned the box just to receive even worse welded stand the second time!
customer_reviews.text: The stand that comes with this product is horribly welded together. I returned the first box that came and now the second one is even worse! The stand now is so misaligned that the cups do not fit through the opening. The welds are so bad that they burnt off the chrome when they tried to reweld the broken frames. The cups and saucers luckily were not broken as many other people have reported. I will just throw away the stand and keep the cups in the cupboard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super nice and durable! Perfec addition to my new espresso machine (:
customer_reviews.author: Alex Vee

customer_reviews.title: Price was right
customer_reviews.text: Great set. The stand is well built. The cups are perfect size for my espresso machine. I like that they stack since counter space is an issue at my house.
customer_reviews.author: RopeMan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Needed new cups. These are sturdy a bit larger than most so that was really nice. The stand is very well made and looks good on our counter next to our greek coffee pot. Nice to have the set right there for a quick cup of coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Shore_Diver

customer_reviews.title: Nah
customer_reviews.text: One broken plate. The cup and plate holder came crooked I couldnt even get the cups out. I got this same espresso set and had no problem with those
customer_reviews.author: Cayla Dallen

customer_reviews.title: Not as great quality as desired yet good enough for now
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for espresso bar and while they are not awesome quality (made in China, of course), they are suitable and of reasonable quality. Will look elsewhere for a different set. These are okay in the meantime.
customer_reviews.author: veronicaB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect esspresso size that is perfectly compact.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size & compact. I have a set in my kitchen, my office and I'm buying a set as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: MASkinner

customer_reviews.title: Very bad quality and damaged
customer_reviews.text: Was supposed to be brand new yet the actual stand and one of the mugs came stained and its not removable. The stand also came crooked so the mugs aren’t able to hold firmly.
customer_reviews.author: Paulina Tawil

customer_reviews.title: So confused and angry!
customer_reviews.text: They are very cute, but I'm so confused... and honestly, kind of angry and irritated. The description says 7 oz cups, someone in the Q&A said they're only 6 oz and 2 1/2 inches high. BUT mine are 4 oz and 2 inches high. The box says 7 oz cups, but obviously they are not. So did they package the wrong items in my box???? Way too much of a hassle to package them and send them back, so I'm stuck with some tiny cups that I can't really use. I will NEVER buy their crap again.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl R Yee

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Love the small amount of counter space these take. Looks just like the picture. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: K. Monk

customer_reviews.title: Wrong set, Broken cup
customer_reviews.text: Just received this in the mail. Not only was one of the four cups smashed to pieces in the packaging, but it's the wrong set! I ordered the 7oz cappuccino cup set, and what I received was the 4oz demi cup set. Sending it back and ordering another one...
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Zumwalt

customer_reviews.title: I thought I'd put this set in the cupboard when ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd put this set in the cupboard when not in use, but its attractive enough and takes a small footprint on the counter I keep the set out all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Curmudgeon

customer_reviews.title: Great for coffee lovers!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this a couple of years ago and still use it today! Durable cups, perfect for a cappuccino at home.
customer_reviews.author: MallyMalz

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Nice and compact, however, the handle holes are too small for my hands and I have smaller hands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for espresso lover
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for the espresso lover in your life. I also bought adorable paddle spoons to go with these for my 20-year-old son.
customer_reviews.author: Michele in TX

customer_reviews.title: A perfect small coffee setup
customer_reviews.text: The presentation alone makes this set worth the money. The cups are a nice 7+ ounces for an easy cup of coffee (not too big) with a little bit of cream and sugar. The build quality is excellent as the craftmanship of the porcelean is stunning and the whole set is easy to clean after use.
customer_reviews.author: wheezal

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I keep them stacked right by espresso machine so they're handy. I store them upside down, which works just as well. They're perfect for double espressos!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Cups and saucers are very nice and just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Cups and saucers are very nice and just what I wanted. However, the packaging is cheap and one of the plates arrived broken into many pieces so I had to return the whole set.
customer_reviews.author: Jagged

customer_reviews.title: Cappuccino Cups, perfect to use!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Espresso maker! Love the stack look... very clean and sleek.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of cups
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these to go with our new coffee maker, which does lattes, mochas, capucinos, etc. as well as regular coffee. This is a very nice set of cups, very compact, yet nice enough to leave out on the counter. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Balk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a cappuccino or latte... Or any hot beverage for that matter. Doesn't take up much counter space and convenient for everyday use (and we drink coffee/tea everyday, throughout the day). Solid.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect expresso cups and wonderful space saving way of storage!
customer_reviews.author: robert parker

customer_reviews.title: Broken cup
customer_reviews.text: One cup was broken on arrival. The packaging was poor such that the cups were able to slide back and forth within a large box. Otherwise, everything was fine. Still cute but am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stackable Porcelain Cappuccino Cups & Saucers
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product but wish they only sold just the cups as I don't really need the saucers. However, I still like using the cups so I can make a small cup of coffee, cappuccino or Expresso for my family. It's so compact too.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my espresso machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this little set. The cups are perfect, great for a 2 oz espresso or just barely for a double. I LOVE the stacker as I have a very small kitchen. The cups fit perfectly in my Nespresso Pixie. These are great, I definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: K. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this set as a gift from a good friend's wish list. She enjoys using it.
customer_reviews.author: Zara

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Cups and saucers are great quality. Wire rack makes storage really convenient - easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: B. Carlisle

customer_reviews.title: Cups are okay, but the stand is very roughly and badly made by a blind welder
customer_reviews.text: the stand is soldered/welded very badly and crookedly. So much so, that it's practically unusable. That was one of the nicer features of this set, to have that stand to organize. Unfortunately can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: LongRifle

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Cups and saucers are great quality. Wire rack makes storage easy and convenient. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Carlisle

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had to bend the wire frame a bit more open so the cups could slide in easier.
customer_reviews.author: Kat P.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality... Gave as a gift (out of box) and they thought they were name brand! Fits perfectly under my Nespresso machine and the cup holder looks awesome and neat!
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: Classic cup
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of these cups...perfect for a lungo sized espresso.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good item and fast free shipping  will buy from this seller again Thanks A++
customer_reviews.text: Good item and fast free shipping will buy from this seller again Thanks A++
customer_reviews.author: Kevybar

customer_reviews.title: The cups and saucers are nice.
customer_reviews.text: It's not perfectly level, somewhat bent. The cups and saucers are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Gilliland

customer_reviews.title: These are not 4 oz as the description and box ...
customer_reviews.text: These are not 4 oz as the description and box indicate. They have a serving capacity of 80 ml (~2.7 fl oz). I had to return mine.
customer_reviews.author: J. Shirif

customer_reviews.title: Great Demi Cups + Elegant space saving
customer_reviews.text: I love the design on these cups and as far as I can tell they are good quality. I live in a smaller apartment and I keep these out on the counter next to my espresso pot where they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Small but cute
customer_reviews.text: Very small just for small cup of coffee, less then 7 oz.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got espresso and small counter space?
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful espresso cups, stacked nicely. I have them nest to my coffeemaker in the break room, my son uses it for focus groups, they are simple and elegant. You can buy cheaper. You cannot buy nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Ladner

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love this set of espresso cups ! I had no problems ordering this, getting this on time. I would buy this again for other peeps for gifts and such too.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Grant

customer_reviews.title: Stackable Cappuccino Coffee /Tea Set
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted for tea. I prefer a smaller cup and this is perfect. It stacks nicely and doesn't take much room on my counter.
customer_reviews.author: KLKota

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: These a cute little boogers! They work perfectly for my Nespresso machine (small cup only). Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Boston

customer_reviews.title: Great looking piece for the modern or rustic kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Reminds me of when I lived in Italy! Great quality, and couldn't be more impressed with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniele

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and functional
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase, the cups and saucers are strong and they have a good size to hold a nice cappuccino. I keep them next to my coffee maker to ensure they are easy to reach and accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set used for my mother in law for Christmas. The box was is good condition as was the product inside. She loves the set and proudly displays in next to her keurig.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Irvin

product_meta.title: HIC 9-Piece Stackable Espresso Coffee Set, Fine White Porcelain, 4 (4-Ounce) Cups with Matching Saucers and Metal Stand, Gift Boxed
product_meta.description: Style Name:EspressoHIC’s 9-Piece Stackables Porcelain Espresso Cup and Saucer Set for serving and enjoying espresso, coffee, tea, and other favorite beverages. Cups and saucers are crafted from fine-quality porcelain with a natural heat-retaining characteristics to help keep beverages warmer longer. They’re stackable for room-saving storage inside the stand, which not only keeps each piece in place, but displays nicely on the buffet and table. The stand easily transports the entire coffee serving set for use anywhere, even for outdoor entertaining. Cup and saucers are microwave safe so reheats are a breeze. HIC’s Stackables are great hostess gifts and coffee gifts for at-home baristas. A tradition since 1957, HIC Fine Porcelain is safe for use in the microwave, oven (to 500-degrees Fahrenheit), and freezer. Dishwasher safe for easy cleanup. Set includes 4 (4-ounce) espresso cups with matching saucers and decorative chrome stand.
feature_bullets: HIC’s 9-Piece Stackables Espresso Set for serving and enjoying espresso, coffee, tea, and other favorite beverages
Made from fine-quality porcelain; naturally retains heat to keep beverages warmer longer; set includes 4 (4-ounce) cups, 4 saucers, and 1 chrome stand
Pieces stack inside the stand for room-saving storage on the buffet or table; transports easily for use anywhere, even for outdoor entertaining
Great as elegant hostess gifts and coffee gifts for at-home baristas
Microwave safe for quick reheats; safe for oven (to 500-degrees Fahrenheit) and freezer; dishwasher safe
